reviewText: This is a good video for students - it covers basic terminology and concepts in pencil rendering, and each rendering method described is then demonstrated.

A very good mostly still life use of plain pencil drawing that introduces names for types of shading and texturing with pencil,
and the techniques are illustrated well in real drawing schemes.
Only one color pencil was used ( white on black) and the drawing are not really as impressive as they might be while still being very good.
